title: Book a Ski Lift and Rental Package
description: A skier wants to book a 2-day lift ticket and a full ski rental package (skis, boots, poles).

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a package that includes a lift ticket and equipment rental at a discounted rate.

tasks.description: Collect the skier's details, including height, weight, and shoe size for the rental equipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all necessary information for the equipment rental.

tasks.description: Book the 2-day 'Lift & Rental' package and provide the customer with a voucher to pick up their tickets and equipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully books the package and provides confirmation.
